title: Hayate no Gotoku! Cuties (Dub)
alternative_title: Hayate the Combat Butler! Cuties, Hayate no Gotoku! (2013), ハヤテのごとく！ Cuties
description: Taking place after the events that occurred in Hayate no Gotoku! Can't Take My Eyes off You. Hayate, Nagi and Maria return to their daily lives at the Sanzenin Mansion and the Violet Mansion.
